titles.title: A resolution relative to the death of Representative Sala G. Burton, of California.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 2/2/1987--Introduced. Expresses the condolences of the Senate on the death of the Honorable Sala Burton, a Representative from California.
